title: What is DOM in Web Development
content: The Document Object Model (DOM) is the data representation of the objects that comprise the structure and content of a document on the web.

title: What is a compound assignment
content: Compound assignment operators are shortcuts that do a math operation and assignment in one step. For example, x += 1

title: What is a concatenation operator
content: Concatenation operators join multiple strings into a single string. There are two concatenation operators, + and & . Both carry out the basic concatenation operation, as the following example shows.
